alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 3:37AM EST until November 09 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of an inch or less and ice accumulations from a few hundredths to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest chances for a light glaze of ice will be across the higher terrain. Ice will be mainly confined to colder, elevated surfaces, but could also impact bridges and overpasses. Air temperatures will rise later Thursday morning changing all the wintry precipitation to rain.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.
